Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Malibu in 1969...
Injured on 6/28/1970 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/28/1970 with a Strained Tricep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1974 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 8/1/1974...
Released by Malibu on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 11/3/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1978, off Gabriel Vargas (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1978, off Sam Barnes (PG)...
Injured on 6/26/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 3/1/1981 to a minor league contract.
Released by Plum Grove on 4/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/19/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $300,001 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 3/1/1983 to a minor league contract.
Released by Plum Grove on 4/7/1983...
